properties.Name: CustomerIdentification
properties.Description: The Identification assigned to a Customer.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: IdentificationId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the identification.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartTimestamp
Columns.Description: The period start timestamp that the party is assigned the identification.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndTimestamp
Columns.Description: The period end timestamp that the party is assigned the identification.

Columns.Name: CustomerIdentificationNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the Customer Identification.
